definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: The law firm is registered at Jingan District, Shanghai.
Jing'an District government has arranged food and accommodations for fire-affected residents evacuated to nearby hotels.
sentences.chinese: 靜安區政府部門爲火災疏散的居民就近安排了食宿。

sentences.english: Officials sacked for deadly high-rise fire in Shanghai .
sentences.chinese: 上海靜安區多名官員因高樓大火案被免職。
